input_email_body:
Subject: 

A security breach in medical data was identified during a routine software update You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. This might have occurred due to outdated security protocols. So far, critical systems have been patched, and access logs have been reviewed for any anomalies My name is Liu Wei.. Immediate action is necessary to prevent further breaches.
